name: Crystal Witch Cyber Jams
description:
!!!Warning!!! This game contains flashing GIFs.

Crystal Witch Cyber Jams is (an ironically glitchy) game by Jillian Wakarchuk, Jesse Gazic, and Jorie Stern. Run around a neon Montreal and get your music gear back before a show. Don't let the evil cult get you down.

If you find the big game bug, I'm sorry the code is bad. Try a different path! The story is worth getting to the end for!
